Method Detail

submitProperties

public boolean submitProperties(boolean shouldAskIfWantToSubmit)
Actions to take when the rule has been submitted.

Parameters:
shouldAskIfWantToSubmit - true if the user should be asked if they are sure they want to submit. When submit happens programmatically, this may need to be false.
Returns:
true if the properties were submitted and false if the submission was canceled.
